mapper.select:
select nvl(sum(t.ldzl),0) ldzl, nvl(sum(t.rgyyfwl),0) rgyyfwl, nvl(sum(t.zdyyfwl),0) zdyyfwl from DB_SW12366.TJ_YYFWFX t where 1 = 1 and t.rq >=
and substr(t.jgbm, 1, 7) = substr(${unitCode}, 1, 7)

select (case when sum(c.zjrgl) is null then '100' else to_char(round(sum(c.rgyyfwl) / sum(c.zjrgl) * 100, 2)) end) jtl from db_sw12366.tj_yyfwfx c where 1=1 and c.rq >=
and substr(c.jgbm, 1, 7) = substr(${unitCode}, 1, 7)

select (case when sum(c.fcmysum + c.mysum + c.ybsum + c.bmysum) = 0 or sum(c.fcmysum + c.mysum + c.ybsum + c.bmysum) is null then '100' else to_char(round((sum(c.fcmysum + c.mysum) / sum(c.fcmysum + c.mysum + c.ybsum + c.bmysum)) * 100, 2)) end) myl from db_sw12366.tj_yyfwfx c where 1 = 1 and c.rq >=
and substr(c.jgbm, 1, 7) = substr(${unitCode}, 1, 7)

select substr(t.bmzdname, 0, 4) yjmc, substr(t.bmzdname, 7, 10) ejmc, sum(t.slsum) sl, trunc(sum(t.slsum) / 300) sizee, min(t.bmzdcode) lxdm, '' enname from db_sw12366.sh_ywqktj t where t.tjlx = '3' and to_date(t.rq, 'yyyy/MM/dd') >=
group by substr(t.bmzdname, 0, 4), substr(t.bmzdname, 7, 10) having sum(t.slsum) > 2000 order by sum(t.slsum) desc

select substr(t.bmzdname, 0, 4) yjmc, substr(t.bmzdname, 7, 10) ejmc, sum(t.slsum) sl, trunc(sum(t.slsum) / 300) sizee, min(t.bmzdcode) lxdm, '' enname from db_sw12366.sh_ywqktj t where t.tjlx = '3' and to_char(to_date('2018/1/1', 'yyyy/MM/dd'), 'yyyy-mm') = substr(t.rq, 0, 7) group by substr(t.bmzdname, 0, 4), substr(t.bmzdname, 7, 10) having sum(t.slsum) > 2000 order by sum(t.slsum) desc
select count(*) value from db_sw12366.tx_call_logo t where t.inivrdt > sysdate - 10 / (60 * 24) and substr(t.unitcode, 1, 7) = substr(${unitCode}, 1, 7)
